description.compact: The PRE_INSTALL_CMD event occurs before the install command is executed.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Script\Event instance.

description.compact: The POST_INSTALL_CMD event occurs after the install command is executed.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Script\Event instance.

description.compact: The PRE_UPDATE_CMD event occurs before the update command is executed.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Script\Event instance.

description.compact: The POST_UPDATE_CMD event occurs after the update command is executed.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Script\Event instance.

description.compact: The PRE_STATUS_CMD event occurs before the status command is executed.

description.compact: The POST_STATUS_CMD event occurs after the status command is executed.

description.compact: The PRE_AUTOLOAD_DUMP event occurs before the autoload file is generated.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Script\Event instance.

description.compact: The POST_AUTOLOAD_DUMP event occurs after the autoload file has been generated.

docblock.description: The event listener method receives a Composer\Script\Event instance.

description.compact: The POST_ROOT_PACKAGE_INSTALL event occurs after the root package has been installed.

description.compact: The POST_CREATE_PROJECT event occurs after the create-project command has been executed.

docblock.description:
Note: Event occurs after POST_INSTALL_CMD
The event listener method receives a Composer\Script\Event instance.

description.compact: The PRE_ARCHIVE_CMD event occurs before the update command is executed.
